Automation isn’t magic. Here’s how it works

1
2
Input
Use chat history to build chatbot dialogue and conduct initial BoticAI training.
Prediction
BoticAI predicts the correct human intent from multilingual support requests.
3
4
Judgement
Our NLP experts set the confidence threshold for intent detection, based on a top-k heuristic.
Action
Your chatbot sends correct replies to humans, or passes the conversation to an agent
5
6
Outcome
Substantial customer support automation and increased customer satisfaction
Training
BoticAI increases automation by re-training on live chat history.

Natural Language Processing

Problem
Natural language processing engines excel at English, but they fail to deliver high accuracy for other major languages.
Solution
SiniticAI™ natively supports multiple languages, and understands mixed language text using deep learning techniques adapted from image-matching technology.
